message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. This product is worth a great deal to me, no less than $1,000,000.  I understand it holds even greater value for you, and I'm confident you'll see the potential it has. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,100,000. This price allows you to secure a valuable asset while also giving me a fair return on my investment.  Let me know your thoughts.
